title: Is there any syntax difference between Java 5 and Java 8 besides new features? - Quora

response.answer_text: Provided they follow at least remotely semanti versioning, the answer is yes. You are referring to change of 3 major versions. 5.x.x to 8.x.x. From http://semver.org/ Given a version number MAJOR.MINOR.PATCH, increment the:1.MAJOR version when you make incompatible API changes,2.MINOR version when you add functionality in a backwards-compatible manner, and3.PATCH version when you make backwards-compatible bug fixes.
